info.+content: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。
Shoko Komi is stll trying to make 100 friends. She has new adventures in the school, together with her friend Tadano, the one who inderstands her best. Steadily, she gets closer to her goal.
"Ao 100 Iro" (100 Blue Colors) by Miku Itō
"Koshaberi Biyori" (Fine Day for Small Talk) by FantasticYouth
TVアニメ『古見さんは、コミュ症です。』公式サイト

title.+content: It`s Just the Arrival of Winter.
It`s Just the "I Love You Game".
It`s Just an Invitation to Lunch.
It`s Just the End of the Year.
It`s Just a Group Decision for the School Field Trip.
It`s Just the School Field Trip.
It`s Just the 2nd Day of the Field Trip.
It`s Just an Oni and Her Club.
It Has Just Been One Year.
